actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide, in the training of health professionals, for an increased emphasis on the ethical, social, legal, and moral implications of advances in biomedical research and technology.

summary.text: Provides that in the training of health professionals, under the Public Health Service Act there be an increased emphasis on the ethical, social, legal, and moral implications of advances in biomedical research and technology.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide, in the training of health professionals, for an increased emphasis on the ethical, social, legal, and moral implications of advances in biomedical research and technology.
